committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the sale of gold bullion by any agency of the United States unless specifically authorized by law.

summary.text: Prohibits any sale of gold bullion on behalf of the United States unless Congress authorizes such action by law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the sale of gold bullion by any agency of the United States unless specifically authorized by law.
